english.segment1: Lord we cry. Meet us here. Change our hearts. Bring us near
english.segment2: And we come to this place God. And offer up our hearts. We're holding to Your promise that. You'll meet us where we are. We come broken in sin. For yet You still call our names. And Your Glory surrounds us. And brings us to our knees
english.segment3: Lord we cry, will you meet us here. Meet us here
english.segment4: Lord we bow. In Your name. Saved by Grace. Cleansed in blood
english.segment5: And we come to this place God. And offer up our hearts. We're holding to Your promise that. You'll meet us where we are. We come broken and sin. For yet You still call our names. And Your Glory surrounds us. And brings us to our knees
english.segment6: Lord we cry, will you meet us here. As we're calling on Your name. Come and meet us here. As we're falling on our knees before You. Reaching out for all Your Love. We're on our knees reaching for You. Father meet us here. Come and meet us here
english.segment7: Spirit meet us. Spirit meet us here
